short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a trump quote to the bottom of every page so that his strong words can act as the strong foundation to your webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add trump quotes to every single web page, so whenever you get to the bottom you've got something to bring you up!
